ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T15:58:25 [Issue ID 4000-124297] urn:comicvine:4000-124297 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-17 11:48:15. [Issue ID 735309]
ComicInfo.Summary:
Her mind shattered by the previous issue's events, a helpless Vampirella finds herself trapped in Hell. The conspiracy hiding her origins continues to unravel and the dark forces behind it grow desperate to erase the truth from her mind. The only way to do it, though, is to return to where it all began. An epic trek across the wastes of Hell commences. It's destination? Drakulon, and the grave of her mother, Lilith. The origin of Vampirella continues.
Vampirella is stuck in her childhood, when she is brought back to hell.
ComicInfo.Title: Source, Part 2
